content: carry on to the decreases the convertible set up begins on row 44 46 48 48 or at the base of the fingers right mitten - work the first 22 24 26 28 sts to get to the palms sts left mitten - the palm sts are at the start of the round so no set up is needed take a piece of contrasting yarn and knit across the 18 20 22 24 palm sts then go back to the beginning of the palm and knit the contrasting yarn stitches again make sure you change back to your main yarn this will give you a stripe of your contrasted yarn that can be removed later then continue with the round as charted decreases decreases begin row 56 61 64 66 or at the base of the little finger it is important to note that the palm and top decreases are different this is to provide a better fit decrease as shown in
